meanings.definition: The point in the orbit of a celestial body that is farthest from the center of the body it orbits.
meanings.sent1: The spaceship reached its apogee, the farthest point from Earth.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber reached the apogee of the peak, feeling accomplished.
meanings.sent3: At the apogee of the roller coaster, everyone screamed with excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness soared to the apogee when she received the award.
meanings.sent5: The kite flew to the apogee of the sky, dancing with the clouds.
